website_summaries.verdict: The EOZ Audio Air true wireless earphones deliver solid audio performance, but their price and battery life are bigger selling points.
cons: Audio can drop out momentarily when volume is adjusted
On-ear controls could be slightly more sensitive

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for Buck
customer_reviews.text: YouTuber Flossy Carter brought me here. His review was heartfelt and brutally honest. These are my first truly wireless headphones and they are a beast. Nice deep bass Rich warm mid tones Crisp highs
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Tamez

customer_reviews.title: They’re Great but Instructions Should Be Clearer When Pairing Both Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: If you’re having trouble pairing both earbuds, follow the instructions below: 1. Make sure to unpair and delete your EOZ AIR with ALL your Bluetooth device 2. Turn off your EOZ air by a long press on the center of each of the buds for 3 seconds 3. long press in the center of each of the buds for 15 seconds, until you see the blue led blinking 3 times twice. 4. long press 5 seconds on each of the buds, and then press quickly 4 times on each of the buds, your earbuds should now be reset. I had to contact Amazon customer service regarding this issue, so I wish these instructions were in the manual.
customer_reviews.author: TheEyedol

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line sound without paying for it!
customer_reviews.text: Not my first earbuds but might be my last for this price. Under rated earbuds incredible sound!!
customer_reviews.author: Hector A. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: Wouldnt even pair to each other (tried soft reseting and hard reseting and nothing worked), had to pair individually and even then they wouldn't automatically connect to my phone. DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Down!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these against my better judgment based on the reviews. Decided I’d given them a try anyway. The earbud in the right side would say connected but no sound. The left side worked fine. Sound quality seemed good in that one but what’s the point If they don’t work properly. If you decide to purchase them, good luck! These are being returned. I didn’t want to spend $250 for Beats but I ended up purchasing them anyway after this experience.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine P

customer_reviews.title: sounds good.
customer_reviews.text: dislike short battery life. touch buttons annoying. but a great product.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: These earphones are really amazing
customer_reviews.text: In term of quality of material, it seems a lot more durable than others brandis. I like the design of the case and I’m really impressed by the battery life. It’s been already one week that I use it (for music but also a lot for my work calls). I’m also using it for sport (running) and thanks to the secure over the ear, I'm not affraid to make it fall when I'm doing sport, even when I sweat. I like the touch control to control my music (the bass is great!) and call without using my phone. It a nice premium true wireless earphones for a good fair price.
customer_reviews.author: "sinpave"

customer_reviews.title: MAJOR...MAJOR...MAJOR...GO!!!
customer_reviews.text: Minutes out of the box and I'm Blown away!!! How...do you get this kind of Sound, Bass, Treble, overall balance and as close to HiFi Audiophile Grade sound out of ear buds, 100% wireless earbuds??? As Floss would say...these are a MAJOR...MAJOR...MAJOR...GO!!! Absolutely the most Bang For Your Buck!!! Please Add the Waterproof IP rating to the headline on these!!! If your on the fence, BUY EM, you will not be disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: SIN RIVALES

customer_reviews.title: answering calls are difficult
customer_reviews.text: The mic is very bad while speaking through the buds as the receivers always ask me to speak up. when i get a call and i start wearing the buds, suddenly the call might be cut by accidentally touching the buds, very sensitive. Always getting disconnected and reconnect for a second while listening music or watching videos. The only good thing is the bayttery back up but the bulk of case is huge. The case is not fitting in the pants pocket.
customer_reviews.author: IRSHAL

customer_reviews.title: No good while moving due to constant disconnection
customer_reviews.text: It was good in term of quality how ever I read in couple reviews there was suddenly disconnection from one side or from the phone. I have bt 5.0 note 9 and while your moving the sound will suffer from disconnection constantly rendering this device useless . If you don't need to move then is find.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Palma

customer_reviews.title: They're good!
customer_reviews.text: First off sound quality is great once you get the right fit. Controls work as they should and they pair up pretty quick.minus one stat because they do lose connection sometimes when my phone is in my right pocket. Minus one star because the first set I got was DOA.
customer_reviews.author: Mendez Family

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Pairing. Great when working...
customer_reviews.text: The product (when it works) is awesome! Awesome fit, great sound, and great battery life. Superb comfort and volume. Here's the issue: Headphones constantly have issues pairing with each other. Reseting them worked for the first couple months but now they just won't pair period! Now that the return window has closed, I can't get a refund and have yet another pair of Amazon bought bluetooth earbuds that can't get it right. EOZ wireless airbuds seemed promising and is a great deal at just over $100 but not if they don't function as advertised. Amazon, stop selling faulty electronic products. You'll see on my history that I've tried countless bluetooth headphones. Either it's pairing issues or just bad design.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Fit is great, it seems if earbuds werent in my ears. The only flaw for me was the sound has way too much mids and berly can hear bass realy good highs though. Doesnt have an an app to control EQ. if it wasnt for mids issues I would rate the an easy 10.
customer_reviews.author: metro

customer_reviews.title: Would be fantastic - if the mic worked
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I love these headphones. They keep a charge for an incredibly long time, are comfortable in my small ears, stay put during workouts, and have great sound. BUT the mic really does not work on calls...which is a big part of the reason why I wanted wire free headphones. If you are planning to take a lot of calls with these, I would look elsewhere. Every time I'm on the phone with someone, they say they can't hear me or my voice is really muffled, and I end up having to go to speakerphone. Sigh. I hate to return these because I like the other aspects, but I need a mic that works!
customer_reviews.author: Corrie

customer_reviews.title: Cool but has issues for price
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable but have some issues. Sometimes they won't charge and won't pair with each other. Supper irritating when out on the motorcycle and don't have another pair of earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Gilberto Plascencia

customer_reviews.title: Earbuds stopped pairing with each other
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds worked very well for about a month and a half, then all of the sudden the earbuds stopped pairing with each other. Each bud will now pair individually with my phone and the audio only plays out of the active bud. I have gone through all the reset options that are supposed to fix this problem and none of them have remedied my problem. So now these earbuds are essentially an expensive paperweight. These earbuds are great when they work, but they don't.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: For $100 these cant be beat. Sounds quality is good, volume is good, fits good. Only issue I have had is they disconnect from each other and its a bear to get them synced. so far its only happened once in last month.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rackley

customer_reviews.title: Pairing issues
customer_reviews.text: Great for about a week then I started experiencing pairing issues with the right earphone. They unpaired twice in a week and I honestly thought about chucking them in the trash, which is shame because I really wanted to like these.
customer_reviews.author: retrophonic

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: As many others have stated, the right earbud no longer connects or pairs, no matter how many voodoo dances I did to try and correct it. For this kind of money, I expected more
customer_reviews.author: amazing

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to my expectation!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been in the market for ear buds for a little while, I stumbled on these from a you tube review and knew these were it the sleek look, easy pairing, battery life, ear-hooks,and color are what sold me.... very comfortable and sound quality is actually surprisingly good but this is for me to each their own. I’d recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jaytee Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Constantly disconnecting with each other! Pairing issues!
customer_reviews.text: Initially these worked great. After some time now I am very upset because everyday I have to reconnect them with each other at least 2 times! This is horrible! Everytime I am on a run it disconnects with either my phone which is on my hand or the headphones are disconnected with each other! I was really excited about these headphones but now they are definitely not worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jose C.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy These
customer_reviews.text: Left ear bud suddenly stopped working and can not be reset and now they're just junk. These buds had great potential but like the last three pairs of earbuds that I've bought on Amazon of they quickly falter and or outright fail.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl D. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Way better then powerbeats
customer_reviews.text: Just got em and I love em. They are super loud and sound GREAT. Sounds louder then my powerbeats tbh. Had to replace my powerbeats because the wings kept breaking so I got tired of em and got these and these are way better
customer_reviews.author: Cazembe Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these earbuds a coupe months ago and they are not reliable. I already had one replaced but it would charge or turn on, this took a month to ship from China. Not it’s been a month with the new replacement and they are both acting now. After a 25min jog they thrum off and on everything 2seconds. Super frustrating to had spent this much on these earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are my first wireless bluetooth earbuds. I adore them. They fit nicely and are comfortable to wear for hours at a time. Great sound also. I'm glad I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia C.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible customer service.
customer_reviews.text: They had great sound!!!! I loved using them in the gym. The issue is when something happens. I only had them for 3 days. The right one stopped working. Trying to get in touch with customer service for the company is a job in itself. Lucky I bought them from amazon and I was able to send them back to them.
customer_reviews.author: Sean McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made! Try at your own risk!
customer_reviews.text: Just got them today and sending them back today! Left bud doesn’t charge. So not even worth listening to them. Should of known better then to buy something with less then 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: bookworm96

customer_reviews.title: Connection Issues....
customer_reviews.text: I started having issues with lost of connection on the right earbud. These earbuds use a hero and sidekick connection meaning only one connects to the phone and then transmit the signal to the other. The right was the hero and once that lost connection it took several attempts to reconnect. After about a week, I got rid of them and got powerbeats pro for my workout ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: EB78660

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound
customer_reviews.text: I had these for about 6 months and the left ear bud has stopped working. When they work I love the quality of sound from them and they are easy to pair.
customer_reviews.author: R. Roth

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction and cool looking
customer_reviews.text: These are really cool looking. The battery also lasts a long time. Sound quality is quite good, especially given that I'd never heard of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Right earbud doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Right from the start the right ear bud didn't work. I charged them overnight and used the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Howell

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: I really like the earphone because I don't have to worry about them falling out of my ears. They are comfortable. My only complaint is I wish the controls were easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound quality, comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through many earbuds both wireless and wired, but these are the best for their price. The earbuds are extremely comfortable and have fantastic sound quality. I haven't had trouble with them falling out at all.
customer_reviews.author: sho

customer_reviews.title: EOZ Air - True Wireless Earphones
customer_reviews.text: The ear buds are great occasionally the signal on the right bud goes out but connects back with in a second or two. Over all the sound is great. The battery in the case last so long. I havn't even charged the case since I got it. I'm happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Take forever to pair
customer_reviews.text: These take forever to pair. Very disappointing when my main goal is to get out the door to start my run. I usually just leave with one paired to my phone if not I’ll never get out the door. Don’t waste your money on these!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to pair and listen to music on both Earbuds at the same time
customer_reviews.text: Firstly both earbuds won't connect at same time so I end up using just one at a time.. have hard reset em several times but no luck.. The Right earbud is little uncomfortable, after using for few minutes my ear hurts so most of the time I'm using the Left earbud.. Sound quality is OK no where close to what some of the reviews I've read..
customer_reviews.author: AmazGuest

customer_reviews.title: Better than Galaxy buds
customer_reviews.text: Sounds better and are louder than my Samsung Galaxy buds. The fit is amazing I used them for the gym and they never fall. Base is great especially when listening to hip hop music. 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.author: Brandon S.

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 side works, not worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: Only one earbud works, and it is unclear how to change the ear cushions.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Connection & paring
customer_reviews.text: The headphones sound great but the connection is horrible. It randomly disconnects, and doesn't always pair. I do not recommend these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Westchester Mum

customer_reviews.title: Horrible piece of JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: The right ear bud stop working and its pass the return date. The crazy thing I only used it less than 10 times before it malfunctioned and now I can't get my money back
customer_reviews.author: Jim M.

customer_reviews.title: Major major major connectivity issues
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about EOZ Air after reading all of the reviews. The device I got had one ear disconnect constantly. I tested it many times and followed the instructions they added in the box for this issue - but no fix. I lost all confidence in this device. I would recommend to stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after three months
customer_reviews.text: Right earbud stopped functioning after three months. Steer clear folks! I have other similar products that are years/decades old that are still working. Buy something else!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchase at Your Own Risk
customer_reviews.text: I own several pairs of wireless earbuds and these truly Disappoints. The Sound is Alright, but the issue is Pairing. It is Difficult at best, having Patience will be Tested.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R Trimble

customer_reviews.title: Tricky to Pair, but Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Best in ear buds there is for the price... Period amazing sound quality with deep rich base. Blown away for how good they r for that price... Usually other brands with these features are 200 plus easy...
customer_reviews.author: Swiss

customer_reviews.title: Amazing earbuds with a cheap case
customer_reviews.text: My only problem with these earbuds is the case, it’s nice looking but once you feel it you know it’s cheap! You can actually hear the charging case rattle in your pocket while you’re walking.
customer_reviews.author: Truth

customer_reviews.text: Really great sound. Only issue is I can only use one at a time because it's hard to resynchronize even with the instructions
customer_reviews.author: Keanu Kobashigawa

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: First of all, no direct customer service phone number. Secondly, I can't wear/use both earbuds when listening to music and it doesn't tune out crowd.
customer_reviews.author: M. Zenon

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: These dont have a volume control on the earbuds why also not very impressive sound quality tried all tips couldnt get good seal not worth 109 dol.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndell h.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working ...
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working , just bought them in April . They were working great at first , but for some reason they now pick up two separate signals . While one of the air bud connects , the other doesn’t .
customer_reviews.author: JC Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Good wireless sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: Directions for use are a bit lacking. Make sure to charge fully before attempting to pair. Otherwise they work well and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jtmcn1

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product
customer_reviews.text: One earbud just doesn’t work, submitted request and will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon Boothe

customer_reviews.title: Just average ear phones
customer_reviews.text: Sound is fair,comfort is fair. Lacking volume control so you have to pull your phone out to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: John Simono

customer_reviews.title: Short
customer_reviews.text: My product is experiencing a short on one of the ear buds
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: EOZ Air TWS True Wireless Bluetooth 5.0 Earbuds with mic and Charging Case - Incredible Sound & 90 Hours of Playtime (All Black)
feature_bullets: ✅ENJOY PRISTINE QUALITY SOUNDS - If it's pro quality sounds you're looking for, then you'd be hard pressed to find a better alternative to our graphene driver-equipped deluxe wireless Bluetooth buds.
✅LISTEN ALL DAY LONG - Don't let the music stop while you're out doing your thing. Our premium earpods are engineered to last for up to 90 hours, thanks to their 2200 mAh charging case.
✅ MOVE WITHOUT WORRIES - Fitted with ultra comfortable over-the-ear hooks, our modern headphone set is specially designed to stay securely in place no matter how much you move throughout the day.
✅ EXPERIENCE A PERFECT FIT EVERY TIME - Each EOZ Air purchase comes with three pairs of silicone ear tips and two pairs of memory foam buds—all of different sizes—for maximum fit and comfort.
✅ 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - If you're not completely happy with your EOZ Air purchase, just send the product back within 14 days and we'll be happy to give you a full refund—no questions asked!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.1 out of 5 stars151 ratings3.1 out of 5 stars
